channel.title: Ideas on Anjjan Narayan's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Ideas on Anjjan Narayan's Homepage

item.title: The idea behind creating a Minimalist website
item.description: The less I needed, the better I felt. - Charles Bukowski Recently, I was in a pursuit of trying to identify things that are needed in life. I suddenly realized what Tyler Durden from Fight Club once said - We buy things we don’t need with money we don’t have to impress people we don’t like. I was wasting my time trying to over-design a fancy website for myself.
